meanings.sent1: She is the trimmest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The cat groomed itself to be the trimmest in the litter.
meanings.sent3: The trimmest tree in the forest was the favorite spot for the birds to rest.
meanings.sent4: Her trimmest outfit made her stand out at the party like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The trimmest line on the painting highlighted the artist's attention to detail.

meanings.sent1: The trimmest house on the street had a perfectly manicured garden.
meanings.sent2: He aimed to have the trimmest beard among his friends.
meanings.sent3: The trimmest slice of cake was saved for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The trimmest path through the woods led to a hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The trimmest edges of the book were worn from frequent reading.

meanings.sent1: The trimmest hedge in the garden required regular maintenance.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed the trimmest collection of seashells on her shelf.
meanings.sent3: The trimmest ribbon on the gift made it look extra special.
meanings.sent4: The trimmest part of the story was the unexpected twist at the end.
meanings.sent5: The trimmest details of the design were meticulously crafted by the artist.
